sidekick.name: Code Review Boy
sidekick.bio: After his parent process was killed in a tragic code coverage accident Testing Man has dedicated his life to preventing regressions and fighting the scourge of feature creep that threaten his beloved application.

nemesis.name: Time Cruncher
nemesis.bio: Since the Dawn of UTC the Time Cruncher has meticulously thwarted Testing Man with arbitrary deadlines and binding contractual delivery dates.

nemesis.name: IE 6
nemesis.bio: Concentrated evil that only runs on Windows XP, the mere threat of support is enough to chill the heart of any web developer. That Which Shall Not Be Named, lurks, in the backlog...waiting.

name: Dynamic Types Guy

nemesis.name: Commander Runtime Error
nemesis.bio: The only things that are certain in life are death, taxes, and runtime errors.

bio: Dynamic Types Guy can be whatever you want him to be, just be careful what you wish for.

name: Startup Man

sidekick.name: The Incredible MVP
sidekick.bio: Just good enough to go out on a date but not enough to bring home to meet your parents. The Incredible MVP is always the star for the moment, good for a few dates, but ultimately comes up short against the more attractive and stable Version 2.0

nemesis.name: Professor Capital
nemesis.bio: Money can't buy happiness, but it can buy you runway.

powers: Making the world a better place

nemesis.name: Dr. Self-Documented
nemesis.weakness: Can tell you how, but not why

name: Works-On-My-Machine Man

nemesis.name: Doctor Ops
nemesis.bio: Your best friend and worst enemy, just don't ask them to do a deployment at 4pm on a Friday.

powers: Turning it on and off again

name: RESTman
bio: Off PUTting at first, RESTman GETs the job done by meeting his challenges HEAD-on predictably and logically. Only DELETEing his foes when it's the only OPTION

name: The Project Manager
bio: Forged in the Crucible of Collaboration, the Project Manager seeks to bring harmony to the endless strife between Sales, Engineering, and the Executive. The Hero this company deserves and needs.
